page.title: 16RECREATION IN PARR.
page.content: We went out into the streets near school with the intention of interviewing pedestrians and shoppers about the way they spent their leisure time. 1."Do you think the council should spend more on recreation in Parr?". All the people we asked said "Yes". 2."Do you think the facilities we have are any good?". One person answered "Yes", six answered "No", and four said "Some were", for example Parr Swimming Pool. 3."If there were better facilities, would you use them?". Eight said "Yes", two said "No", and one replied "I don't think so." 4."What is your overall opinion of recreation in St.Helens?". One thought it was average, one said it was very poor, the rest dismissed it as rubbish.
